## What can you customize?

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(paletteer)
library(cowplot)
ggplot2::theme_set(theme_cowplot())

library(Data4Ecologists)
```

(Nearly) everything.
